page.title: 04Tourism Pevensey Area.
page.content: There are many visitors from this country and abroad to Pevensey and Pevensey Bay . About 33,000 tourists visit{Pevensey Castle}each year because of its historical attraction. Every year{special festivals}are held there such as medieval banquets, craft fairs and open air church services. People can also visit the{Court House {the Old Mint House}and the beach at Pevensey Bay.Some people come to stay in bed and breakfast accommodation or hotels in the area,there are also 7 private camping and caravan sites, two are on farms.The holiday season runs from the beginning of April to the end of September.{Fairfields Farm/Caravan {and Camping Park}is a family tourist attraction with 60 caravans.The Farm Park has both rare breeds and domestic animals.There are also working shire horses pulling carts.
